/usr/lib/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/bin/g++    CMakeFiles/deneme.dir/deneme.cu.o CMakeFiles/deneme.dir/cmake_device_link.o -o deneme   -L/usr/local/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib /usr/local/lib/libPALISADEpke.so.1.11.0 /usr/local/lib/libPALISADEbinfhe.so.1.11.0 /usr/local/lib/libPALISADEtrapdoor.so.1.11.0 -fopenmp /usr/local/lib/libPALISADEcore.so.1.11.0 -fopenmp -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs" -lrt -lpthread -ldl
